Auth.Title: Login
Auth.PresentationText:
Search easily for your deceased in a cemetery

When you are in a cemetery looking for a loved one, through a simple search by name you can find out the exact spot where he is buried.

Many other interesting services will soon be integrated into the app.

Search.Title: Search a deceased
Search.SubTitle: Enter all the data you have
Search.ErrorGen: There was a problem trying to retrieve the data. Check your internet connection or try later.

Detail.WarnAnonimoText: This feature is reserved to only not anonymous user.
Detail.WarnDefuntoExistsText: Selected deceased is alredy in your relatives

MieiDefunti.Title: My relatives
MieiDefunti.AccediSubTitle: This feature is not available for anonymous users
MieiDefunti.PresentationTitle: From this screen you will can:
MieiDefunti.PresentationHtmlContent:
• View the list of your relatives
  • Quickly access the deceased card of one of your relatives
MieiDefunti.NessunDefuntoText1: You haven't added any deceased yet
MieiDefunti.NessunDefuntoText2: Click on the blue button below, search for a deceased and add it to your deceased.

Info.Title: Project informations
Info.Html1:
Aldilapp is a project distributed and managed in Italy by STUP1 srls.

The intent of the project is to encourage the digitization of cemetery registers and at the same time provide support to citizens in tracing the bodies of their friends and / or deceased relatives.

If your municipality does not have an agreement with us, you cannot benefit from Aldilapp services, ask for informations via the reference site aldilapp.it
Info.Html2: The organizations that have joined to Aldilapp are:
